rules_text:
If a creature would die, exile it instead.
When Resting Tombs enters, exile target creature an opponent controls until this enchantment leaves the battlefield.
{3}{B}{B}: Exile all creature cards from all graveyards. Transform Resting Tombs. Activate only as a sorcery.
rules_text2: At the beginning of your end step, put a creature card that's exiled with this enchantment onto the battlefield under your control. That creature becomes a 1/1 Spirit creature in addition to its other types and gains flying and “If this creature would die, put it on the bottom of its owner's library instead.”
